title: League games not opening
body:
Hi,
Recently, I reinstalled league, and did have some issues with the visual c++ installation, but it did install.
However, after trying to start a game, i received an error, saying that the file :\WINDOWS\SYSTEM32\d3dx9_39.dll is not designed to run on windows (which it is) or it contains an error. I have installed a new version of the same file, what should i do? Thanks
